layout.name: spitAngle
layout.title: Spread
layout.tooltip: The directional range, in degrees, which the eggplant will spit out NPCs.

layout.name: projectileSpeed
layout.title: Projectile Speed
layout.tooltip: The speed that the NPC will be spit out at.

layout.name: fireDelayTicks
layout.title: Timer
layout.tooltip: Number of frames the egg-plant waits between spit attempts.

layout.name: spawnLimit
layout.title: Spawn limit
layout.tooltip: Number of NPCs that the egg-plant can generate at a time;  it will not spit out any more until one or more of the NPCs it generated despawns.
